{{Wired embedded system |brand=Technologic Systems |model=TS-4800 |revision=REV. C |is_manuf=Yes |est_release_date=07/2011 |type=SoM |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX51;MCIMX515CJM6C; |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0B-PCB0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G164QQ-HCE6 |ram1_num=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=SMSC |eth_chip2_model=LAN8710A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=FPGA w/ 8K LUTs;Lattice;LFXP2-8E;;1;,,, Serial Real Time Clock Chip;STMicro;M41T00S;;1;,,, Microprocessor Reset Circuit;ST Micro;STM1001;;1;,,, 2.7V 11-14bit Digital Temperature Sensor;TI;LM73;;1;,,, Hi-Speed USB Transceiver w/ ULPI Interface;SMSC;USB3315;;1;,,, Tri-Mode 300mA LDO Regulator w/ Enable;ON Semi;NCP585;;1;,,, 1.5A Low Quiescent Current Synchronous Buck Regulator;Renesas;ISL8009A;;1;,,, PMIC for i.MX35/51;Freescale;MC13892;;1;,,, Dual Inverter Gate;TI;SN74LVC2G04;;2; }} {{TagLine|Video GPU & FPU Embedded SoM}} :[https://www.embeddedts.com/products/TS-4800 Product page]
===Documentation=== *[https://docs.embeddedts.com/TS-4800 ''Computer-on-Module Documentation''] *[https://github.com/embeddedTS ''Code Respository'']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Freescale (NXP)]] i.MX51 (MCIMX515CJM6C) :ARM (Cortex-A8) @600MHz *Storage: 512MB (NAND) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 256MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Network: 1x FE ports via CN2
==Images== <gallery> File:Technologic Systems TS-4800 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Technologic Systems TS-4800 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
